document.full_text: yemeni president ali abdullah said on friday he was ready to cede power, the third arab ruler who may be forced out by popular protests which began in north africa and have now spread into the gulf, syria and jordan.
document.title: yemen ruler ready to step down, syria protests spread
lines_and_colors: yemeni president ali abdullah said on friday he was ready to cede power, the third arab ruler who may be forced out by popular protests which began in north africa and have now spread into the gulf, syria and jordan.
